synopsis.text: Experienced in the triumphs and trials of life, six middle-aged men find themselves embarking on an unexpected journey in the world of idol stardom. As part of the Manpuku Geinou Production agency's innovative project, the Eternal Boys, these men defy societal norms and personal limitations to chase their dreams. From former professional athletes to office workers, each member brings a unique background to the group. Despite facing challenges related to age and physical condition, they remain determined to prove that it's never too late to shine. Will their collective resolve and diverse experiences propel them to success in the competitive idol industry? Join the Eternal Boys as they strive to redefine what it means to be an idol.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
